title: NBA Africa Valued Near $1 Billion
itunes:title: NBA Africa Valued Near $1 Billion
description:
The National Basketball Association is expanding in Africa through a deal that values its operations on the continent at $1 billion. Mike Lynch and Scarlet Fu catch up with NBA Africa CEO Victor Williams and find out where he sees the growth of the league in 3-5 years.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
